title: The Complete History Of The NBA FiveThirtyEight » Nate Silver | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: How do you rate an NBA team across decades of play? One method is Elo, a simple measure of strength based on game-by-game results. We calculated them for every NBA (and ABA) franchise after every game in league history — over 60,000 ratings in total. Read about our methodology. Elo ratings have a simple formula; […]
